#include<stdio.h>

#define ll long long 

int main()
{
        ll int t , n , m , a ,b ;
        scanf("%lld",&t);

        while ( t-- )
        {
                scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&m);
                a = 1; b = 1;
                for ( int i = 1; i < n ; i++ )
                {
                        a = (a+b)%m;
                        b = (a+b)%m;

                }
                printf("%lld",a%m);
                printf("/");
                printf("%lld\n",b%m);
        }

        return 0;
}
